content.text: Match ends, Everton 1, Manchester City 3.
Second Half ends, Everton 1, Manchester City 3.
Offside, Everton. Jordan Pickford tries a through ball, but Yannick Bolasie is caught offside.
Foul by Beni Baningime (Everton).
Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Substitution, Manchester City. Danilo replaces Aymeric Laporte.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Attempt saved. Oumar Niasse (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Theo Walcott with a cross.
Substitution, Everton. Oumar Niasse replaces Cenk Tosun.
Substitution, Manchester City. Ilkay Gündogan replaces Kevin De Bruyne.

Substitution, Everton. Beni Baningime replaces Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Bernardo Silva.
Attempt missed. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by David Silva.
Attempt missed. Cenk Tosun (Everton) header from very close range is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Raheem Sterling.
Goal!  Everton 1, Manchester City 3. Yannick Bolasie (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
